altTitles.en: 99.99% Lovers

description.en:
"I’ll give you 1 billion won now, and 2 billion won after you give birth."

Did I hit the jackpot?! Wouldn’t it be good to receive 3 billion won and then run away? Three times. We only have to sleep together three times.

…That idea completely changed my life.
description.ko: “한 번당 10억, 그리고 출산 후 20억을 드리겠습니다.” 이게 웬 떡?! 30억 받고 그대로 튀면 되는 거 아니야? 세 번. 딱 세 번만 자고 튀자. ..그 잘못된 생각으로 인해 내 인생은 완전히 틀어졌다.

altTitles.en: Bonkura Bon Bon House
Bonkura Bon-Bon House

altTitles.ja: ボンクラボンボンハウス

description.en:
A neet, building a house?!
From “3am Dangerous Zone” and “Third-Generation Chemist Kyubee” author, Nemu’s Yoko’s latest work!

After dropping out of college without her parent’s consent, Kazuki returns to her hometown. Back in home, she manages to get her furious parents give her the remaining 2 million yen from her tuition and decides to live in her grandmother’s renovated beauty parlor.

However, even with her unstoppable 2 million yen, it isn’t enough for Kazuki to work on the house and fulfill all of her desires!!!
She ends up renting a part of the house to Seidai, a hairdresser, who was looking for a place to settle down his shop, but before that… it must be renovated…

With the help of Eikichi, a former interior designer, walls and ceilings will be teared down, restoring Kazuki’s house from top to bottom, and with that, Kazuki’s DIY life will officially begin…!

What’s to come to the DIY life of this blockhead? Maybe love will come?

altTitles.ja: 君だけは死んでもごめん

altTitles.en: Even If I Were to Die, I Wouldn't Choose You

altTitles.vi: Dù Có Chết Tôi Cũng Không Thích Cậu Đâu
Cho Dù Tôi Có Chết, Tôi Cũng Sẽ Không Chọn Cậu

description.en: The admirable middle-school girl gifted with both beauty and intelligence, Yagami Mitsuko, has a secret. And that is, being an incredibly enthusiastic fan of her classmate Souichirou. From his "good morning" until "good night", she closely watches him wherever he goes. His favorite food, his body weight & height, his bedtime and school courses, even the TV shows he watches, she is undoubtedly a fan who knows everything about him... Or rather, she has become his stalker completely... However, a boy who likes her chases her with the same type of infatuation appeared……!?
description.ja: 才色兼備で学校中の憧れ女子、八神美都子には秘密がある。それは、同級生の蒼一郎の熱心なファンであること――。おはようからおやすみまで彼の動向を見守り、好きな食べ物から身長体重、就寝時間に通学コース、見たＴＶ番組まで完璧に把握するファン……というか、完全なストーカーであること。けれど、そんな彼女のことを好きだと追いかけ回す男が現れて……!? しかもその男は、盗聴器に盗撮機器、ＧＰＳまで使いこなす『美都子よりもレベルが高い』ストーカーで……？

title.en: Wazawai no Avalon ~Game Saijaku no Akuyaku Debu ni Ten'i Shita kedo, Ore dake "Yasereba Tsuyokute New Game" na Sekai datta no de, Saisoku Level Up & Hametsu Flag Kaihi de Kage no Eiyuu o Mezashimasu~

altTitles.ja: 災悪のアヴァロン～ゲーム最弱の悪役デブに転移したけど、俺だけ“やせれば強くてニューゲーム”な世界だったので、最速レベルアップ＆破滅フラグ回避で影の英雄を目指します～

altTitles.en: Finding Avalon: The Quest of a Chaosbringer

description.en:
The main character loves the MMORPG game called Dungeon Explorer Chronicle (Dun-Ex). During one particular day, a beta test event was announced, and he managed to beat it.
In exchange for clearing the event, he was granted permission to try the beta test server. Forcing to choose different avatar and skill as the system doesn't allow his own, he eventually settled on random. However, he is transferred to a place where, as expected, he finds a fat, villainous mob character...!
description.ja: 廃人ゲーマーの会社員“俺”は、やり込んだVRMMO「ダンエク」の世界に転移した。しかし転移先は悪役のデブキャラで!?

altTitles.en: Youngest Scion of the Mages

altTitles.es-la: El Hijo Menor del Renombrado Clan Mágico

altTitles.en: Youngest Son of the Renowned Magic Clan

description.en:
As the author of "Swordmaster Sade," Cha Sungmin had no idea how dangerous his plot-hole-riddled novel could be until he's reborn as Rasen Mayton, a spoiled side character destined to die at 17. As if being stuck in the body of a rude scumbag despised by everyone wasn't enough, Sungmin also discovers that he was reborn at a point before his story began. 

With almost no knowledge about the current timeline, will Sungmin be able to survive in this unwritten world as House Mayton's youngest?

title.en: Akujo ga Kishi no Kyouai Kara Nogareru Houhou

altTitles.ja: 悪女が騎士の狂愛から逃れる方法

altTitles.en: How Can I Escape from This Knight's Crazy Love?!

description.en:
“A fate where you’re destined to be killed by an obsessive knight…!!”

The protagonist finds herself reincarnated as Victoria, the villainess in a romance novel.
Victoria’s inevitable fate is to be killed by her loyal knight, Cain.
Under the influence of a charm spell, Cain loves her blindly, and eventually, that love spirals out of control.
On top of that, if Cain discovers that the real Victoria’s soul has been replaced by someone else, things will definitely not end well…!
To avoid this deadly future, Victoria decides to break the charm spell while pretending to be the villainess.
However, Cain’s gaze, which initially felt terrifying, gradually becomes sweeter and more affectionate…!!

title.en: Orc no Shuhai ni Shukufuku wo

altTitles.ja: オークの酒杯に祝福を

altTitles.en: The Half-Blood Orc in the Blended World

description.en: Half-Orc Elpis and Margit, the daughter of a corrupt nobleman, go on an adventure in search of WHISKEY, left behind by the teleporter Tanaka!
description.ja: そこは《酒》が魔法の魔力源となる世界。ハーフオークのエルピスは師である転移者タナカの遺した《ウィスキー》を求め、悪徳貴族の令嬢マルギットが世界を旅する！

altTitles.ja: サンダ

description.en:
In the year 2080, the world is like it is now, yet different. Government-arranged marriages, elaborate plastic surgery, and medical science are at the forefront of Japanese society.

Sanda Kazushige is a middle-school student who hasn't quite matured, despite being in the thralls of puberty. Put into a life-threatening situation by his classmate Fuyumura, Sanda discovers his uncanny ability to turn into a burly (and more grown) Santa Claus, and is thrown into a world of chaos to save his fellow students in only ways Santa Claus can do, while trying to solve the mysteries of the school he attends and the truth to where his supposedly-dead classmate Ono went.
description.ja: これは少し未来のお話。超少子化が進み、様々な風習が失われた近未来。大黒愛護学園に通う普通の少年、三田は、なぜか同級生の冬村四織に命を狙われていた。突如として振り下ろされる凶刃。それには、行方不明になった冬村の友人と、三田が抱えている「とある呪い」に理由があって…!?

altTitles.ja: アメイジング デジタル サーカス

description.en:
Where is the exit?

The comic adaptation of the dark comedy begins!

Published monthly in print in Corocoro Ichiban! and online in Weekly Corocoro Comic.
___
**Cooperation:** InfoLens Inc.

title.en: Bungo Stray Dogs Gaiden - Ayatsuji Yukito VS. Kyougoku Natsuhiko

altTitles.en: Bungo Stray Dogs: Another Story: Yukito Ayatsuji vs. Natsuhiko Kyogoku

altTitles.ru: Великий из бродячих псов: Аяцудзи Юкито против Кёгоку Нацухико

altTitles.ja: 文豪ストレイドッグス外伝 綾辻行人VS.京極夏彦

altTitles.uk: Літературні генії - бродячі пси: Гайден інша історія

description.en: Known for his biting wit and rapid-fire brain cells, Yukito Ayatsuji is a detective and top-ranked skill user who possesses the ability to expose any crime. When a request to investigate a puzzling murder incident hits his desk, Ayatsuji must team up with Mizuki Tsujimura, a spunky agent sent from the Special Division, to tackle the case. Can the unlikely duo get to the bottom of this mystery?!
description.ru: Аяцудзи Юкито, известный как «Детектив-убийца», который вследствие своей опасной способности находится под наблюдением Цудзимуры Мизуки, агента-новичка из Особого отдела по делам одаренных. Аяцудзи просят раскрыть дело об убийстве, однако за кулисами стоит его заклятый враг, Кёгоку Нацухико, который дергает за ниточки...?!

altTitles.en: Celebrity Lady

description.en: The Ugly Duckling Becomes the Empire’s Top Celebrity! Juliet Karenina, the era’s hottest celebrity, wakes up in the body of noblewoman Louvetria Diorlos in another world. Faced with a clumsy body and a timid personality, Louvetria endures bullying from those around her: Twins who mock and ostracize her. Her unrequited love, Kedric, who scowls at her. Her step-grandmother, Molga, who torments her in secret. But with Juliet’s spirit inside her, Louvetria won’t tolerate it anymore. “I won’t stand for this, no matter who it is. “Louvetria’s bold transformation begins!

altTitles.ja: 二兎の除霊師

altTitles.en: Two Rabbit Exorcists

description.en: Gotsuji and Uruka, two exorcists, spend their days hunting down and banishing "evil spirits." Their mission is to track down and slay a specific malevolent spirit. At the heart of this quest lies Gotsuji's deep, unresolved grief and vengeance for a woman who died long ago. While Gotsuji is consumed by a thirst for revenge, Uruka, who struggles to understand this obsession, faithfully stays by his side. Together, these two exorcists are bound on a journey, but where will it lead?
description.ja: 除霊師の五辻とうるかは依頼を受けて"悪霊"を祓う毎日を送っていた。彼らの目的は、ある悪霊を捜し出して斬ること。そこにはかつて死んだ女性に対する、五辻の強い想いと弔意があった――。 仇討ちに執着する五辻と、それを理解できないながら伴走するうるか。ふたりの除霊師の旅の行きつく先とは…？ バニーと和装で霊を殺（ト）れ！

altTitles.en: Omnipotence
Omniscient And Omnipotent

description.en: Do good or go to hell. The conditions of his new curse seem simple enough for once-hopeful hoodlum Jeonji Kim. Or so it seems when his perky guardian angel shows up on his doorstep one day and heals his limp. But will simply going through the motions of helping people be enough to appease a petty god with a grudge?
description.pl: Bądź dobry lub idź do piekła. Warunki jego nowej klątwy wydają się wystarczająco proste dla niegdyś pełnego nadziei chuligana Jeonjiego Kima. A przynajmniej tak się wydaje, gdy pewnego dnia jego żwawy anioł stróż pojawia się na jego progu i leczy jego utykanie. Czy zwykłe pomaganie ludziom wystarczy, aby udobruchać małostkowego boga miejącego urazę?
description.ru:
Ты был легендой — стал никем,
Как старый лев среди шакалов.
Мечты все обратились в тлен,
Погребены среди завалов.

Увидев слабого, толкни,
Пусть и его жизнь станет адом.
Вот только даже в наши дни
Легенды оживают рядом. © RSC
description.pt-br: Faça o bem ou vá para o inferno. As condições de sua nova maldição parecem simples o suficiente para o outrora esperançoso bandido Kim Jeonji. Ou assim parece quando seu animado anjo da guarda aparece em sua porta um dia e o cura. Mas será que simplesmente fazer o que é necessário para ajudar as pessoas será o suficiente para apaziguar um deus mesquinho com rancor?

altTitles.ja: 《魔力無限》のマナポーター ～パーティの魔力を全て供給していたのに、勇者に追放されました。魔力不足で聖剣が使えないと焦っても、メンバー全員が勇者を見限ったのでもう遅い～

altTitles.en: Manaporter of 《InfiniteMagic》

description.en:
Thanks to his infinite mana, Ishua has been working as a mana porter to the hero party, doing a perfect task of supplying mana to the party members who consumed a lof of MP and earning the trust of his companions. However, Alan, the hero decides to banish him from the party in a fit of jealousy. 

"We don't need a mana porter!"

And chasing after Ishua through the forest Aria, the saint, appears wishing to continue adventuring with Ishua. The story of the banished strongest mana porter begins here!
description.ja: 生まれ持った無限の魔力で、マナポーターとして勇者パーティ全員の魔力供給を担ってきたイシュア。だが彼は、ある日突然、理不尽な理由でパーティを追放されてしまう。落胆するイシュアのもとに、彼を追ってきたパーティ仲間の聖女アリアの姿が。実は追放は勇者の独断で、彼女はイシュアが自分たちを見捨てたと思い、連れ戻しに来たのだった。真実を知ったアリアはパーティ脱退を決意し、イシュアは彼女と二人で旅を始めることになる。追放された最強マナポーターと、彼を追放した勇者。二人の対照的な冒険が今始まる!!

altTitles.ja: 感受点

altTitles.en: Sensitive Point

description.en: An interconnected omnibus of stories that explores the subtle distortions of everyday life, delving into how ordinary experiences can take unsettling turns. Each narrative weaves together to examine the eerie sensations that arise when the familiar becomes uncanny.

altTitles.ja: ちょっとだけ抜けちゃう柊さん
Hiiragi-san is a little careless.

description.en: Kotori-kun, who falls in love with his classmate Hiiragi-san at first sight, somehow wants to get close to her. Hiiragi-san is quite an earnest and lovely girl, but… She’s surprisingly a little careless--! This is about the charming school life of a careless girl and a pure boy who gets led on everyday by her -- a romantic comedy that’s a wee bit H sometimes but warm and fluffy to death.

altTitles.ja: のあ先輩はともだち。

altTitles.en: Noa is My Senior, and My Friend.

description.cv:
Ҫитӗннӗ ҫыннӑн хурлӑ та тертлӗ пурнӑҫӗнче «туссем» кирлӗ.

Вӑйӑ кумппанийӗнче пулса пыракан халап хӑйӗн ӗҫӗнче тата ҫынсем хутшӑнвӗнче «виҫеллӗ» Уччукка Риххиттӑвӗ (23-ри) тата хӑйӗн ӗҫӗнче пӗтӗм вӑй паракан ӗҫчен Савуттуме Нуви (27-ри) тавра ҫаврӑнса тӑрать. Икӗ сӑнар, вӗсен пурнӑҫӗсем пӗр-пӗринпе ҫыхӑнмалла мар пек пулсан та, «туссем» пулса тӑраҫҫӗ...
Ҫапла пуҫланть те кӑшт ҫепӗҫ те кӑшт йывӑр ӳххисри «туссен» камичӗ!
description.en:
A bitter and painful adult's life needs "friends".  Set in a game company, Rihito Otsuka (23), who is your everyday salaryman, and Noa Saotome (27), the ultimate career woman. Two characters whose lives aren't supposed to intersect become "friends" by chance.  A little sweet and slightly heavy office "friends" comedy begins!

---

**Links:** 
- [Alternative Raw (Ch15 Continue Here)](https://ynjn.jp/allEpisodeList/10427)
description.ja:
苦くて辛いオトナの人生にこそ、“ともだち”が必要だ。ゲーム会社を舞台に、仕事も人付き合いも“ほどほど”が身上の「平熱さとり系」大塚理人(23)と、何事にも全力すぎる「限界バリキャリ」早乙女望愛(27)。交わらないキャラのふたりが、ひょんなことから「友達」に…？　少し甘くて若干重めな「オフィス”ともだち”コメディ」スタート！

---

**Links:** 
- [Alternative Raw (Ch15 Continue Here)](https://ynjn.jp/allEpisodeList/10427)
description.ru:
«Друзья» необходимы в горькой и мучительной жизни взрослого человека.

История, происходящая в игровой компании, разворачивается вокруг Рихито Оцуки (23 года), который «умерен» в своей работе и социальных взаимодействиях, и Ноа Саотомэ (27 лет), карьеристки, которая выкладывается на полную во всём, что делает. И эти два непересекающихся характера случайно становятся «друзьями»?.. И так начинается немного сладкая и тяжеловатая «офисно-дружеская» комедия!

---

**Links:** 
- [Alternative Raw (Ch15 Continue Here)](https://ynjn.jp/allEpisodeList/10427)
description.es-la:
La vida amarga y dolorosa de los adultos necesita amistades. Ambientado en una compañía de videojuegos, Rihito Otsuka, un oficinista de 23 años. Que es normal socializando y trabajando. Y Noa Saotome de 27, que lo da todo en todo lo que hace. Dos personaje que a priori no encajan... ¿Pueden ser amigos por casualidad? 
¡Comienza una dulce y pequeña pero pesada comedia sobre amigos de oficina!

title.en: Namaiki na Gal Ane wo Wakaraseru Hanashi

altTitles.ja: 生意気なギャル姉を解らせる話

altTitles.ja-ro: Namaiki na Gyaru Ane wo Wakaraseru Hanashi

altTitles.en: The Story of Making My Cheeky Gal Sister Understand
The Story of Making My Cheeky Gyaru Sister Understand

altTitles.es-la: El día que decidí hacer entender a mi descarada hermana gal a mi manera

description.en: Every time she opens her mouth, it's nothing but abusive language, and her problematic behavior never stops. The protagonist has had enough and sets a “plan” into motion…??!
description.ja: 口を開けば暴言ばかりで、問題行動が絶えない姉。 彼女に痺れを切らし、主人公が踏み出した“計画”とは---??!
description.es-la:
Su hermana siempre dice cosas hirientes y cuyos comportamientos problemáticos nunca cesan, el protagonista, cansado de ella, da un paso adelante con un "plan"
¿Cuál será...?

title.en: Henkyou Mob Kizoku no Uchi ni Totsuidekita Akuyaku Reijou ga, Mechakucha Dekiru Yoi Yome Nanda ga?

altTitles.ja: 辺境モブ貴族のウチに嫁いできた悪役令嬢が、めちゃくちゃできる良い嫁なんだが？

altTitles.ja-ro: Henkyo Mob Kizoku no Uchi ni Totsuidekita Akuyaku Reijo ga, Mechakucha Dekiru Yoi Yome nanda ga?

altTitles.en: The Villainess Who Came to Marry Into the Frontier Noble's Household is an Exceptionally Capable Wife, Isn't She?
The Villainess Who Was Dumped Got Married into My Family, a Mob Noble from the Frontier, and Turns Out, She's an Amazing Capable Wife?

altTitles.vi: Tôi, một quý tộc ở biên giới đã kết hôn với nữ phản diện có năng lực tuyệt vời

altTitles.pt-br: A Vilã que Veio se Casar com a Família Nobre da Fronteira é uma Esposa Excepcionalmente Capaz, Não é?

altTitles.id: Villainess yang Menikah dengan Seorang NPC Bangsawan Perbatasan

description.en:
Ragna, the heir to a frontier noble family, is a reincarnated former Japanese citizen who realizes that the world he now lives in is the setting of an otome game. Dreaming of a carefree life as an adventurer, his plans are derailed when a war takes his family, forcing him to take on the responsibilities of managing his family’s lands. 

Struggling with the unfamiliar duties of a lord, his already chaotic life takes another turn when an unexpected engagement to a noblewoman from a higher-ranking family is arranged.

To his surprise, the bride-to-be is Alicia, the "villainess" of the otome game’s story — a character destined for heartbreak, a demonic pact, and ultimate destruction. Now sharing his life with someone fated for tragedy, Ragna is swept up in the wheels of fate. 

Can he rewrite the predetermined outcomes of this world and secure a peaceful life for himself and Alicia?
description.id:
Ragna, penerus dari keluarga bangsawan perbatasan, dulunya adalah seorang penduduk jepang yang telah bereinkarnasi, kemudian dia menyadari bahwa dunia yang ditinggalinya sekarang adalah dunia game otome.

Dia yang seharusnya bercita-cita untuk hidup bebas menjadi petualang, seketika hancur ketika keluarganya gugur dalam perang, yang kemudian memaksa dirinya untuk menjadi penerus wilayahnya dan melakukan tugas-tugas untuk mengatur wilayah keluarganya.

Kesulitan dengan tugas-tugas baru yang harus dilakukan olehnya, kehidupannya yang sibuk secara tiba-tiba kedatangan seorang gadis bangsawan dengan status yang lebih tinggi darinya karena adanya sebuah lamaran pernikahan yang dipaksakan kepadanya, dan betapa terkejutnya dia setelah mengetahui bahwa calon istrinya adalah seorang "villainess" dari game otome yang pernah dimainkan olehnya, yaitu alicia.

Alicia adalah sebuah karakter yang ditakdirkan untuk sakit hati, bersekutu dengan iblis, dan menemui kehancuran. 

Karena sekarang ragna diharuskan untuk berbagi kehidupannya dengan seseorang yang ditakdirkan mengalami nasib buruk membuat ragna juga ikut terseret kedalamnya, jadi bisakah dia mengubah takdir dunia ini, dan hidup berdua dengan tenang bersama alicia?
description.ja:
辺境貴族の跡取りであるラグナは、元日本人の転生者で、この世界は彼の知る乙女ゲー世界だった。
気ままにのんびり暮らしたいのに、慣れない領地運営に翻弄される日々。
そんななか、突然、ラグナと格上貴族との婚姻が決まってしまう。
そうして嫁いできた公爵令嬢・アリシアは、なんと乙女ゲーの「悪役令嬢」で――!?
description.vi:
Ragna, người thừa kế của một gia đình quý tộc ở biên giới, là một công dân Nhật Bản kiếp trước đã được đầu thai vào thế giới mới và nhận ra rằng nơi anh đang sống chính là bối cảnh của một trò chơi otome.

Mơ ước về một cuộc sống tự do như một mạo hiểm giả, kế hoạch của anh bị xáo trộn khi một cuộc chiến tranh cướp đi gia đình anh, buộc anh phải gánh vác trách nhiệm quản lý lãnh thổ của gia tộc. Khi đang vật lộn với những nghĩa vụ xa lạ của một lãnh chúa, cuộc sống vốn đã hỗn loạn của anh lại thêm một biến cố nữa khi một cuộc hôn nhân bất ngờ với một quý nữ từ gia tộc công tước được sắp đặt. Ngạc nhiên thay, cô dâu tương lai của anh là Alicia, nhân vật "ác nữ" trong câu chuyện của trò chơi otome — một nhân vật số phận đã được định sẵn sẽ gặp phải đau khổ, ký khế ước với ác quỷ và sau cùng là chết thảm.

Giờ đây, khi phải chia sẻ cuộc sống với người đã được số phận an bài cho bi kịch, Ragna bị cuốn vào bánh xe số phận đầy trớ trêu Liệu anh có thể viết lại những kết quả đã được định sẵn của thế giới này và mang lại một cuộc sống yên bình cho bản thân và Alicia?
description.pt-br:
Ragna, o herdeiro de uma família nobre das fronteiras, é um ex-cidadão japonês reencarnado que se dá conta de que o mundo em que vive agora é o cenário de um jogo otome. Sonhando com uma vida tranquila como aventureiro, seus planos são frustrados quando uma guerra tira sua família, forçando-o a assumir as responsabilidades de administrar as terras da família.

Lutando com as tarefas desconhecidas de ser um lorde, sua vida já caótica dá outra guinada quando um noivado inesperado com uma nobre de uma família de ranking superior é arranjado.

Para sua surpresa, a noiva é Alicia, a "vilã" da história do jogo otome — uma personagem destinada ao desgosto, a um pacto demoníaco e à destruição final. Agora, compartilhando sua vida com alguém fadado à tragédia, Ragna é arrastado pelas engrenagens do destino.

Será que ele consegue reescrever os desfechos predeterminados desse mundo e garantir uma vida pacífica para si e para Alicia?

altTitles.en: Welcome to Demon School! Iruma-kun (Mafia Alternate Universe)

Mairimashita! Iruma-kun Mafia AU

description.en: The beloved characters of Mairimashita! Iruma-kun star in this Mafia-based spinoff! Young Iruma saves an injured mob boss from death... and then becomes his grandson!?
description.ja: 暴力や犯罪は当たり前の貧民街-スラム-で育った心優しい少年・イルマ。瀕死状態で倒れていた、マフィア組織【バビル】のドン・サリバンを助けたことで、イルマの運命の歯車が動き出す！ マフィア組織【バビル】を中心に巻き起こる、マフィア・アクションコメディ！
description.vi: Spin-Off của tác phẩm"Mairimashita! Iruma-kun" theo hướng What-If, thế giới của tác phẩm lần này sẽ xoay quanh việc các nhân vật sẽ sống trong thế giới của các Mafia
description.es-la: ¡Un spin-off oficial de Mairimashita! Iruma-kun, en un universo alternativo en el que Iruma se convierte en un destacado miembro de la mafia. A pesar de tener sólo cinco años, Iruma ha visto muchas cosas como niño de la calle... ¡la más reciente, a un anciano desangrándose justo delante de donde vive! Como buen chico, Iruma se dedica a curar al anciano y no le da importancia. Sin embargo, cuando el anciano regresa de repente, se revela como Don Sullivan, ¡jefe de la organización clandestina conocida como Babyls! Se ofrece a adoptar a Iruma como su nieto, una oferta que Iruma se ve incapaz de rechazar...
description.pt-br: Os amados personagens de Mairimashita! Iruma-kun estrela neste spinoff baseado na máfia! O jovem Iruma salva um chefe da máfia ferido da morte... e então se torna seu neto!?

title.en: Tonari no Seki no Yatsu ga Souiu Me de Mitekuru

altTitles.ja: となりの席のヤツがそういう目で見てくる

altTitles.es-la: La persona sentada a mi lado me mira de esa manera
La persona de al lado me mira con esos ojos

altTitles.uk: Однокласниця що сидить біля мене, дивиться на мене хтивими очима

altTitles.ur: Sath ki kursi par beithne wali mujhe "Un Ankhoñ" se deikhti he

description.en: Of course, viewers are excited, but will those being watched feel the same excitement...?
description.ja: 主人公の池沢くんは、同じクラスの美少女・江口さんのことを「そういう目」で見ている。しかし実は、江口さんも「そういう目」で池沢くんのことを見ていて！？チラ見えする筋肉、汗ばむ肌、髪の香り…互いに興味津々な2人の「下心」から始まる純愛ラブコメ！好きな人のなら、臭いも汗も×××も…全部好き。

altTitles.ja: レ・セルバン

description.en: Once upon a time, an evil dragon lived in this world. To fight it, humans joined forces with the inhabitants of Paradise and, one day, were able to seal an ancient evil. But years passed and the seal was broken, and the dragon was freed to wreak havoc and destroy countries again. A king who has lost his kingdom and a girl who has lost her memory.
description.ru:
Когда очнулась Арсиноя, принцесса страны у подножия горы под названием Хелленталь, с вторжения Илийской империи прошёл уже месяц. В тот день была убита её мать, пробудился злой дракон, а родная земля обратилась в пепел. С помощью «безумицы, поглощающей память» Арсиноя смогла сдержать дракона, но взамен лишилась всех воспоминаний об отце. А теперь на её пути появляется человек по имени Серван и называется её отцом…
Правитель погибшей страны и принцесса, потерявшая память. Сплочённые утратой, вдвоём они отправляются в путешествие ради возрождения былых себя.
description.pt-br: Uma jovem princesa do país montanhoso de Helentar, Arsinoe, acorda e descobre que um mês se passou desde o dia em que o Império de Ilia invadiu. Naquele dia, sua mãe foi morta, um dragão maligno despertou e sua terra natal foi arrasada pelo fogo. Com o poder de Sent Fuana, "Louca que devora memórias", ela é capaz de manter o dragão à distância, mas em troca perde as memórias de seu pai. Agora, um homem que afirma ser seu pai, Cervin, aparece diante dela. Um rei sem pátria e uma princesa sem memória. Duas pessoas reunidas pela perda partem em uma jornada de recuperação.

title.en: Doteihen Reijou ni Hyoui Shita 800-nen Mae no Akujo wa Hissori Seishun o Tanoshinde Iru

altTitles.ja: ど底辺令嬢に憑依した800年前の悪女はひっそり青春を楽しんでいる

altTitles.ja-ro: Doteihen Reijou ni Hyoui Shita 800-nen Mae no Akujo wa Hissori Seishun wo Tanoshinde Iru

altTitles.en: The 800-Years-Old Villainess who Possessed a Low-Ranking Lady Peacefully Enjoyed her Youth

altTitles.es-la: La villana de 800 años que posee a una joven de poder bajo disfruta pacíficamente de su juventud

altTitles.id: Villainess 800 Tahun yang Merasuki Bangsawan Tingkat Rendah Menikmati Masa Mudanya

description.en:
Nora, who had been sealed for 800 years for threatening to destroy the world, was very bored. One day, she heard the voice of a girl—Cecily—wishing to die, and was awakened. By that time, she'd grown feeble, and her body had shriveled. Thus, Nora proposed to Cecily.

"If that's the case, would you lend me your body? In exchange, I promise that in a year, you'll have a friend, a lover, a warm family, and promising future prospect for your perfect restart!"

The "Incorrigible Villainess," Nora, was resurrected in the body of the "Withered Grass Lady," Cecily.
description.id:
Nora, yang telah disegel selama 800 tahun karena menjadi ancaman akan kehancuran  dunia, merasa sangat bosan. Suatu hari, dia terbangun karena mendengar suara seorang gadis—Cecily—yang ingin mati. Pada saat itu, dia sudah lemah, dan tubuhnya terlihat layu. Maka, Nora mengajukan sesuatu kepada Cecily.
"Jika itu masalahnya, maukah kamu meminjamkan tubuhmu padaku? Sebagai gantinya, aku berjanji dalam satu tahun, kamu akan memiliki teman, kekasih, keluarga yang hangat, dan prospek masa depan yang menjanjikan untuk memulai kembali dengan sempurna!"
"Penjahat yang Tidak Dapat Dikoreksi", Nora, dibangkitkan dalam tubuh "Gadis Layu", Cecily.
description.ja:
『稀代の悪女』であるノーラ＝ノーズは、その罪により800年もの間封印されている。
そんな彼女の最近の楽しみは、遠視の魔法で学校というものを視ること。
ある日いつものように学校を視ていると、「死にたい……」という助けを求める声が聞こえてきた。
「死にたいと思うなら、あなたの体を私に預けてみない？」
ノーラは声の主であった『枯草令嬢』と呼ばれるシシリーに憑依。
いじめられっ子だった彼女を取り巻く状況を改善させていく！
800年前の最強悪女、ハチャメチャ楽しい青春を過ごす！
description.es-la: Nora Noze, una poderosa maga que fue sellada debido a sus maldades, ha realizado un pacto con la joven Cecily para poseer su cuerpo y vivir su vida durante 1 año. Ahora Nora deberá afrontar la vida diaria de Cecily y de paso disfrutar las experiencias que nunca pudo en su vida pasada.

title.en: Kimi to Warui Koto ga Shitai

altTitles.en: I Wanna Do Bad Things with You

altTitles.ja: 君と悪いことがしたい

description.en: Mamori Wataya is a tall but dark, plain, and shady high school girl. One day she meets Soushi Fuji, who has a small, thin body and an evil-looking smile. A supporting character that no one can find and a villain that no one likes. This encounter turns their gray days blue.
description.ja: 背は高いけど地味で暗い脇役女子・まもり。嫌いだからとプールの水を抜く、学校一の嫌われ者の悪役男子・藤。悪いヤツの、不思議な強さに惹かれていったその先にあったのは、透き通るような青い日々。

title.en: Soshiki no Shukuteki to Kekkon Shitara Mecha Amai

altTitles.ja: 組織の宿敵と結婚したらめちゃ甘い

altTitles.en: It's So Sweet When I Marry My Organization's Nemesis
I Married My Organization's Arch-Nemesis, and It's So Sweet!

altTitles.pt-br: É Tão Doce Casar com o Arqui-Inimigo da Minha Organização

altTitles.vi: Thật Ngọt Ngào Khi Kết Hôn Với Kẻ Thù Của Tổ Chức Mình

description.en:
"...I hate you!"
"What a coincidence. So do I."

The two once belonged to opposing organisations of supernatural power users, and fought for their own opposing goals. Roushi Saikawa, also known as the "Feather Hunter," and Ritsuka Yanagi, the strongest supernatural power user known as the "White Demon." The two spent their days battling each other and had no normal social experience, but...

"I love you, Rou-kun."
"Me too, Ritsuka."

After their organisation was disbanded, they somehow started dating and then got married! Is their hatred 100 times more adorable? Now, they are the epitome of a lovey-dovey couple, kissing each other at the door every morning when they go to work. But the husband had just one problem. That is, he had never shared a bed with his wife... In other words, even though he was married, he was still a virgin! This is the story of the hardships faced by such a husband, who gets caught up in numerous troubles but continues to make desperate attempts to deepen his love with his strict wife.
description.ja:
「……大っ嫌い！」
「奇遇だな。おれもだ」

　かつて敵対する異能力者の組織に属し、反目し合う目的のために抗争を繰り広げていた二人。
　《羽根狩り》の異名を持つ犀川狼士(さいがわろうし)と、《白魔》と呼ばれる最強の異能力者・柳良律花(なぎらりつか）。
　血で血を洗う毎日を過ごし、まともな社会経験のない二人だったが……

「ろうくん、大好きっ」
「俺もだよ、律花」

　組織解散後はなぜかイチャコラ付き合った上に結婚していた！
　憎さ余って可愛さ100倍？　いまや、毎朝会社に行く際に玄関で「いってらっしゃい」のチューをするくらいバカップルを地で行く夫婦。
　だが夫にはただひとつだけ悩みがあった。
　それは、妻と一度も寝床を共にしたことがないということ……要するに彼は既婚者なのにいまだ童貞であったのだ！
　これはそんな夫が数々のトラブルに巻き込まれながらも、
　身持ちのお堅い妻との愛を深めるため、今日も必死にアプローチを続ける艱難辛苦の物語である。
description.vi:
…. “ta ghét ngươi!”

“trùng hợp thay, tôi cũng vậy”

   Hai người họ từng thuộc hai tổ chức đối địch của những người sử dụng dị năng, và chiến đấu vì những mục đích trái ngược nhau.

       Saikawa Roushi, còn được gọi với cái tên là “thợ săn lông vũ”, và Yanagi Rikka, người sử dụng dị năng mạnh nhất được biết đến với cái tên “bạch ma”. Cả hai đã dành cả ngày để chiến đấu với nhau nên họ không có kinh nghiệm xã hội bình thường nào, thế nhưng…

 “em yêu anh, Rou-kun.”

“anh cũng yêu em. Rikka.”

  Sau khi tổ chức bị tan rã, bằng cách nào đó họ đã bắt đầu hẹn hò và đi đến kết hôn! Có phải sự thù hận của họ đáng yêu gấp 100 lần không? Giờ đây, họ là hình ảnh thu nhỏ của một cặp đôi yêu nhau say đắm, hôn nhau mỗi sáng trước khi đi ra ngoài.

  Nhưng người chồng có một vấn đề khá lớn, Đó là anh chưa bao giờ được ngủ chung giường với vợ mình… Nói cách khác, mặc dù đã kết hôn nhưng anh vẫn còn trinh! Đây là câu chuyện về những khó khăn mà người chồng phải đối mặt, dù vướng vào vô số rắc rối vẫn tiếp tục cố gắng để vun đắp tình yêu với người vợ nghiêm khắc của mình.
description.pt-br:
**Eu Te Odeio, Mas Também Te Amo**  

“...Eu te odeio!”  
“Que coincidência. Eu também.”  

Roushi Saikawa, conhecido como o "Caçador de Plumas", e Ritsuka Yanagi, a usuária de poderes sobrenaturais mais forte, apelidada de "Demônio Branco", pertenciam a organizações rivais que batalhavam por objetivos opostos. Durante anos, viveram enfrentando-se ferozmente, sem tempo para experiências sociais comuns.  

Mas agora…  

“Eu te amo, Rou-kun.”  
“Eu também, Ritsuka.”  

Depois que suas organizações foram desmanteladas, os dois, de alguma forma, começaram a namorar e acabaram se casando! Será que o ódio deles se tornou 100 vezes mais fofo? Hoje, eles são a personificação de um casal apaixonado, trocando beijos na porta todas as manhãs antes de irem trabalhar.  

No entanto, Roushi tinha um problema: ele nunca tinha dividido a cama com sua esposa. Em outras palavras, mesmo casado, ainda era virgem! Esta é a história das dificuldades de um marido dedicado, que enfrenta diversas confusões enquanto tenta desesperadamente fortalecer o amor com sua rígida e poderosa esposa.

description.en:
300 years ago, the invincible warrior Hyeon-oh Kim brought down the Tower of the End, preventing the world’s demise. Though he should have died the moment the Tower of the End collapsed, Hyeon-oh is reborn 300 years later in the body of a 17-year-old boy named Juhyeok Kim.

Meanwhile, he discovers the existence of the Constellations, who were once his disciples 300 years ago but were born during the time when he did not exist in this world. Will he be able to find them again and train them?

altTitles.ja: JESUS 砂塵航路

altTitles.en: Jesus: Path of the Sandstorm

description.en:
Continuation of the manga "Jesus". The legendary killer, hiding under the guise of school teacher Fujisawa Shingo, returns to Japan after more than ten years! What made him come back? What has he been doing for these ten years? Is one of his new students connected to 24?
Read on and find out in JESUS: Path of the Sandstorm!

title.en: Tsukareta Ouji-sama to Kyouikugakari no Goreijou no Hanashi

altTitles.ja-ro: Tsukareta Ouji-sama to Kyouikugakari no Goreijou no Hanashi

altTitles.ja: 疲れた王子様と教育係のご令嬢の話

altTitles.en: The Tale of a Burned-Out Prince Who Made a Princess His Private Tutor

description.en:
Steven, the first prince of the Kingdom of Fierte, used to be called the perfect prince, but now he just spends his days drinking alone in his remote palace from noon onwards in a lethargic mood.
One day, a woman of his age named Ada, the daughter of the Duchess of Raffine, suddenly arrives at his doorstep.
At first, Steven was not pleased with her, but gradually he begins to open up to her.
In the midst of his life, Stephen begins to remember memories of his childhood with Ada...?

altTitles.en: I'm All Out of Health!

altTitles.ja: 公女、絶不調なり

altTitles.th: คุณหนูผู้อ่อนแอ

description.en:
I’ve gone into the body of ‘Ninaina’, the weakest character, who was fated to die once winter came!

With such with weak stamina that it’s hard to even take walks, eat, or just stand, let alone exercise, I have such a tragic life that I even have to endure assassination attempts from my grandfather…

“I will definitely recover my health!”

“Kaiser” who comes to Ninaina’s side with a cold gaze. Receiving the order that he has to keep Ninaina alive, he comes to her side and protects her.

“You will not die. For now.”

---
Ninenya Seiah’s misfortunes began from birth, owing to her mother’s traitorous reputation and subsequent death. Ninenya was thus banished from the noble Seiah family and forcibly separated from her father, Lord Rubenio Seiah. In extremely poor health, Ninenya has mere months to live. To save his daughter, Rubenio enlists the mysterious Count Adelman as her protector. Ninenya must now work with Adelman to improve her poor health and stop her from becoming the victim of a deadly family feud.

---

title.en: The Main Duties of the Vice President

altTitles.ja: 副会長の主なお仕事

altTitles.en: The Main and Favourite Duties of Ms. Kurishita

description.en: In the student council room, you'll never find more than two people: the president, Haiya Gin (that's me), and the vice president, Kurishita Namida. We used to have a bunch of other officers too, but since the vice president took care of everything so easily, everyone stopped coming. She's incredibly beautiful, and an honor student with no flaws to speak of, but... For some reason, she's always messing with me, and only me?! A comedy featuring the antics of a strangely doting, tall vice president and an adorably tiny president begins!!!
description.ja: 生徒会室にはいつも2人しかいない――会長の私と副会長の栗下涙。最初は他にもいろんな役職がいたけど、こいつが仕事を全部片づけてしまうのでみんな来なくなった。容姿端麗で文句なしの優等生なのだが…私にだけいつも変なちょっかいをかけてくる――!?お淑やかの皮を被って行われる愛ゆえの暴走――密室の生徒会で起こるヤバめ偏愛コメディ、ここに開幕！

description.en: Yasu likes his kouhai, Moriyama, who is at the same time extremely assertive, deadpan, and extremely passive aggressive.
description.ja: まったく素直じゃない後輩・守山ちゃんは、自分にアプローチさせようと野洲先輩を挑発したり、時には大胆にアクションしたり…!?
description.pt-br: Yasu gosta da sua kouhai, Moriyama, que é ao mesmo tempo extremamente assertiva, inexpressiva e extremamente passiva-agressiva.

altTitles.en: Don't Mess With the Film Club!

altTitles.ja: 映像研には手を出すな！

altTitles.ja-ro: Eizouken ni wa Te o Dasu na!
Eizouken ni ha Te wo Dasu na!

description.en:
Asakusa Midori wants to create an anime, but she's too disheartened to make that first step by herself. But by pure chance, she meets Mizusaki Tsubame, an up-and-coming socialite secretly dreaming of becoming an animator. Together with Midori's money-loving best friend Kanamori Sayaka, the energetic trio slowly work towards making their "ultimate world" a reality!
___
**Additional Links:**  
- [![](https://i.imgur.com/dQCXZkU.png) Official Anime Twitter](https://twitter.com/Eizouken_anime)
- [Official Anime Website](http://eizouken-anime.com/)
- [Official Live-Action Website](https://eizouken-saikyo.com/)

Two childhood friends—Black, an emotional fashion designer with selective amnesia, and White, a rational writer who’s been absent for two years—reunite to confront their traumatic pasts and navigate the fragile space between heart and mind as they struggle to preserve their friendship on the brink of adulthood.
Grey is... is a deeply emotional coming-of-age series about the messy journey of self-discovery, about friendship, and about the delicate balance between emotion and reason.

altTitles.ja: まんきつしたい常連さん

altTitles.en: Miss Regular Customer Wants to Enjoy
The Regular Enjoying Herself at the Manga Cafe

altTitles.zh-hk: 想盡情享受的常客小姐

altTitles.zh: 想尽情享受的常客小姐

description.en: Izumi, a university student part-timing at a manga cafe, got curious about a regular customer. Her name is Honami, a high school girl who's been coming to the manga cafe recently. This defenseless and seemingly cute girl who he can't take his eyes off of has a secret...!?
description.ja: マンガ喫茶で働く大学生・泉には気になっている常連さんがいた。それは最近よく来店する女子高生のほなみちゃん。どこか無防備で可愛らしい彼女には、目を離せないある秘め事があって…！？ 青春を“まんきつ”する優しいふたりの ちょっとエッチなハートフルラブコメ！！
description.es-la: Izumi, un estudiante universitario que trabaja en un café de manga, tiene una clienta habitual que le interesa. Se trata de una chica de instituto, Honami, que últimamente frecuenta la tienda. ¡Su aspecto es algo inocente y tierno, pero tiene un secreto del que no puede apartar la vista...! ¡Una comedia romántica un poco atrevida sobre dos personas amables que disfrutan plenamente su juventud!
description.pt-br:
Izumi, um estudante universitário que trabalha meio período em um café de mangá, ficou curioso sobre uma cliente regular. O nome dela é Honami, uma estudante do ensino médio que tem vindo ao café mangá recentemente. Essa garota indefesa e aparentemente fofa de quem ele não consegue tirar os olhos tem um segredo...!?

Esta é uma comédia de amor um pouco safada e sincera, onde este gentil casal poderá "aproveitar" sua juventude ao máximo!!

altTitles.ja: 映しちゃダメな顔

altTitles.en: A Face You Shouldn't Show

description.en: Misa is a cabaret girl who frequents a lesbian bar used for one night stands. She meets a shy girl by the name of "Ai" one night and finds herself attracted to her, and discovers later that she is actually a famous actress...
description.ja: 夜に始まり夜に終わる、そんな街の片隅にある雑居ビルで売り出し中の新人女優伊緒とNo.1キャバ嬢の美紗は出会ってしまった。予定調和のハプニングが起きる、女だけのワンナイトを楽しむ店で自分自身も知らなかった性癖を暴かれた伊緒。美紗が働く店の前でひらすら待ち続けたり、「命令してほしい」と頼んだり、二人の関係性はどんどん歪な方向へ――…。

altTitles.en: Fabulous Beasts
There Are Beasts

description.en:
"In this realm mythological creatures roam, descendant of the nine heavens they call home." 

Sibuxiang, a mythical deer-man couch potato, is kicked out of heaven and assigned to support the mythological creatures wandering the human world. He meets and goes on adventures with his friends: the energetic, food loving Pixiu named Pipi, the fanatic moon bunny Tuye, the banished-from-heaven mouse brothers Jinjiao and Yinjiao, and many others. What kind of adventures will they take on?
description.zh:
《人间有神兽，来自九重天 》

随着科技的发展，往日威风凛凛的神兽们日子大不如前。神兽四不像奉命下凡，去解救流落人间的落魄神兽。在凡间，他遇到了走投无路的老同事天禄，不得志的酒友兔爷，被贬下凡的金银角兄弟……从此开启了一段新的旅程。

altTitles.th: สามรั่วตัวแสบ

altTitles.ja: みつどもえ

altTitles.en: Three Part Struggle
Three Way Scramble
Three-way Struggle

description.en: The somewhat precocious and sadistic girl Mitsuba, the somewhat lecherous muscle girl Futaba, and the somewhat mysterious gloomy girl Hitoha. Better known as the (mischievous) "Marui Sisters," this is the story of how these triplets go about their days in Class 6-3 with their cute yet wild antics.
If the world fell apart and you could do nothing but survive, how would you do it? What purpose or peace can you find when all that remains is the ruins of the past?

altTitles.ja: 暗黒デルタ

description.en:
In the otherworldly city of Delta, its grotesque residents sustain themselves by consuming human energy...!

This gritty, action-packed tale marks the first full series from the up-and-coming talent who captivated audiences with the one-shots “Death Salmon Hunter” and “Composter Funeral”!
description.ja: 人間たちの知らない、もうひとつの世界に存在する都市・デルタ。異形の者たちが住まうその都市では人間から吸い出したエネルギーが生活の全てを支え、最も価値のある物とされていた。住人のオーロラもエネルギーを集めて暮らしていたが、自分たちとは異なる価値観を持つ人間世界に興味津々！

title.en: It Seems Like My Friend Has Already Made Several Loops

altTitles.ja: 友人が既に何周かしているらしい

altTitles.ja-ro: Yuujin ga Sude ni Nanshuuka shiteiru Rashii

title.en: Gakuen Mono no Otome Game no Sekai ni Tensei Shita kedo, Cheat-mochi no Haikei Danshi Seito datta you desu

altTitles.ja: 学園物の乙女ゲームの世界に転生したけど、チート持ちの背景男子生徒だったようです。

altTitles.en: It Seems that I was Reincarnated into the World of a School Otome Game, but I was a Background Male Student with Cheats.

altTitles.zh-hk: 我似乎在學園主題的乙女遊戲世界中轉生，但我是一個有外掛的背景男子學生。

description.en: Kenta, a freelancer, is reincarnated into a world that resembles a school otome game that his sister likes, and he finds himself a male student with a background character. In his reincarnation, Kenta tries his best to improve his living environment as a commoner, Kent, by making his part-time bakery across the street from his house thrive, but for some reason, more and more attractive women start to appear around him.
description.ja: フリーターの健太は、妹が好きな学園物の乙女ゲームに似た世界に転生してしまい、気が付けば背景キャラの男子生徒になっていた。転生先では、平民のケントとして生きる健太。家の向かい側にあるバイト先のパン屋を繁盛させようと現代知識を駆使して頑張る健太だが、なぜか周りに魅力的な女性達が増えていき――。

altTitles.ja: 檻ノ中のソリスト
Soloist in a cage

altTitles.en: Soloist in A Cage
Soloist of the Prison

description.ar: في سجن كبير جدا لدرجة تسميته بالمدينة، يتجمع شتى أنواع المجرمين. و بسبب جدرانه الغير قابلة للاختراق استمرت ساكنة السجن بالنمو. و بين كل هذا و ذاك شقيقان، فتاة صغيرة و طفل رضيع. ما هو مصيرهما يا ترى في هذه المدينة البائسة و الباردة؟ قصة من الأمل و النضال تبدأ الآن. ابدأ بقراءته مترجم على مانجا العرب
description.en:
In a prison so big that it is called a city, all sorts of criminals have been amassed. Due to the inescapable walls, the population only continues to grow. Within are a pair of siblings - a young girl and a recently born boy. What will be their fate in this desolate, cold city…? A story of hope and struggle begins.
___
**Official English Volumes:** [Seven Seas](https://sevenseasentertainment.com/series/soloist-in-a-cage/)
description.fa: زندان‌شهر مکانی که بیش از پانصد هزار نفر زندانی را در خود جای داده است و امکان فرار از آن وجود ندارد، چرا که ساکنان آن به طور مداوم توسط هزاران نگهبان ربات تحت نظر هستند. «کلوئی» دختری هفت ساله، تمام عمرش را در این شهر دلخراش زندگی کرده است. او که توسط والدینش رها شده است، روزهای خود را با برادر کوچکش، «لوک» می‌گذراند. از آنجایی که خیابان‌ها مملو از جنایتکاران خطرناک است، او هرگز خانه را ترک نکرده و با مراقبت از برادرش هدف خود را در زندگی می یابد. یک شب، «کلوئی» پس از اینکه متوجه شد همسایگانش در حال تلاش برای فرار هستند، مخفیانه آنها را در حالی که «لوک» را حمل می‌کند، تعقیب می‌کند. در حین فرار همه چیز بهم می‌ریزد و او از برادرش جدا می شود ...
description.es-la: En una prisión tan grande que se llama ciudad, se han acumulado todo tipo de criminales. Debido a los ineludibles muros, la población no hace más que crecer. Dentro hay un par de hermanos: una niña y un niño recién nacido. ¿Cuál será su destino en esta desolada y fría ciudad? Comienza una historia de esperanza y lucha.

altTitles.en: Tying the Knot with an Amagami Sister

altTitles.ja: 甘神さんちの縁結び

altTitles.fr: Se Marier avec une Sœur Amagami
Comment j'ai Marié une Sœur Amagami

altTitles.es-la: El Emparejamiento de la Familia Amagami

altTitles.en: Matchmaking of the Amagami Household

description.en: Kamihate Uryuu, orphaned since childhood, receives an invitation to stay at the local Shinto shrine. All he wanted was a quiet place to study so that he can fulfill his dream of making it into a top medical school, but after arriving there, he comes across three beautiful shrine maiden sisters... and the head priest requests that he marry one of them and take over the shrine. A tale of love and miracles is about to unfold!
description.fr: Kamihate Uryuu, orphelin depuis l'enfance, reçoit une invitation à séjourner dans le sanctuaire shinto local. Tout ce qu'il voulait, c'était un endroit tranquille pour étudier afin de réaliser son rêve d'entrer dans une grande école de médecine, mais en arrivant sur place, il tombe sur trois belles demoiselles du sanctuaire... Le prêtre en chef lui demande d'épouser l'une d'entre elles et de prendre la succession du sanctuaire. Une histoire d'amour et de miracles est sur le point de se dérouler !
description.ja: 京大医学部を目指す高校生の上終 瓜生。児童養護施設育ちの瓜生は「甘神神社」の宮司さんに引き取られ、居候することに。受験勉強ができる環境があれば…と思っていたが、居候の条件は「婿養子として神社を継ぐ」こと!? しかも結婚相手は同居する巫女三姉妹!! 一つ屋根の下、巫女と紡ぐ恋と奇跡の物語、開幕!!
description.ru: Камихатэ Урю долгое время прожил в приюте, пока не был взят под опеку священником Тидори Амагами. Остановившись в храме, Урю узнаёт, что здесь живут три жрицы-сёстры, которые являются внучками главного священника. В конечном итоге, Тидори Амагами рассказывает, что взял парня под опеку, чтобы он женился на одной из его внучек и унаследовал храм, как его зять. Так начинается история любви и чудес с семьёй Амагами.
description.vi:
Được thực hiện bởi phụ tá của Negi Haruba và được chính tác giả của Gotou-bun khuyến khích xem thử. Từ Oneshot nay đã có series và được đông đảo mọi người đón nhận
Uryuu Kamihate chuyển đến Kyoto và tình cờ sống chung với 3 chị em Miko trong một ngôi đền. Tuy vậy cậu lại là một người không tin vào thần linh mà chỉ tin tưởng bản thân mình, chuyện gì sẽ xảy đến với Uryuu khi xung quanh cậu là 3 chị em vu nữ xinh đẹp đây?
description.es-la: Un chico que había perdido la fe en las Oraciones y los Dioses, de pronto conocerá a 3 hermosas Hermanas que son Doncellas del Templo donde comenzará a vivir, ¿Esto afectará de alguna Manera a nuestro Protagonista? Léelo para descubrirlo.
description.pt-br: Kamihate Uryuu, órfão desde a infância, recebe um convite para ficar no santuário xintoísta local. Tudo o que ele queria era um lugar tranquilo para estudar, para que pudesse realizar seu sonho de entrar para uma faculdade de medicina de ponta, mas depois de chegar lá, ele se depara com três belas irmãs donzelas do santuário... E o sacerdote chefe pede que ele se case com uma delas e assuma o santuário. Uma história de amor e milagres está prestes a se desenrolar!

title.en: Anmitsu Hoippu! Watashi ga Inakucha Dame na Kanojo no Hanashi

altTitles.ja: あんみつホイップ！ワタシがいなくちゃダメなカノジョのハナシ

altTitles.ja-ro: Anmitsu Hoippu! Watashi ga Inakucha Dame na Kanojo no Hanashi

altTitles.en: Anmitsu Whip! Stories of My Girlfriend Who Can't Live Without Me

description.en:
"I can't live without you!"

A cohabiting yuri couple, Anzu and Mitsuki, have a relationship where they simply can’t live without each other! A lighthearted and sweet Girls' Love comedy that depicts the lovey-dovey everyday lives of this co-dependent couple. ♪
description.ja:
「アナタがいなくちゃダメなの!」
同棲中の百合ップル、あんずとみつきはお互いにお互いなしではいられない関係。
そんなふたりのいちゃラブな日常を描いた、ゆる甘共依存ガールズラブコメディ♪

title.en: My Harem Consists Entirely of Female Demon Villains

altTitles.zh: 我的后宫全是反派魔女

altTitles.zh-ro: Wo De Hougong Quan Shi Fanpai Monü

description.en: I, the earthling "hero" of this story, crossed over into another world based on a video game and suddenly appeared in a villainous female demon's bed when I arrived. If not for the fact that I had married all the villains in the game before crossing over, I'd have been killed pretty quickly. Now, the villains keep pestering me, asking me to help them rule the world, and vying for my hand in marriage. What am I supposed to do? I'll await your answers online! It's urgent!

altTitles.ja: わからないです　吉田さん

altTitles.en: I Don't Know, Yoshida-san

altTitles.ru: Что же в голове у Ёсиды?

description.en:
Tsukumo Yamada is a simple and unremarkable college student. 

As he is getting ready to go home after finishing his university lecture as usual, a solitary beautiful woman, Mao Yoshida, who is rumored to be a "mermaid princess," passes by. While the boys are in an uproar, Yamada is secretly summoned by Yoshida. When they are alone, Yoshida presses against him. In fact, Yamada and Yoshida have an intimate relationship... 

However, he is unable to grasp the romantic distance between them because Yoshida is too expressionless, and he is having a sweet but bittersweet college life, unable to go from "friend" to "lover".
description.ja: 地味で取柄もない大学生の九十九。大学の講義を終え帰宅準備をしていると孤高の美女「吉田真魚」が通りかかる。九十九と吉田さんは親密な関係なのだが、吉田さんが無表情すぎてなかなか関係が進展しないのだった…。
description.ru:
Повседневная история отношений между двумя студентами, которые всё никак не могут перейти от статуса друзей к возлюбленным.
Ямада Цукумо - обычный ничем не примечательный студент университета. Когда после окончания лекции он уже собирался уходить домой, мимо прошла нелюдимая красивая девушка Мао Ёсида. На самом деле, их уже давно связывают интимные отношения, но они всё никак не могут продвинуться дальше, потому что Ёсида сама себе на уме.
description.es-la: Tsukumo, un estudiante universitario ordinario y sin muchos atributos destacables, vive su día a día con tranquilidad. Pero un dia despues de finalizar sus clases y prepararse para regresar a casa, se cruza con Yoshida Mao, una hermosa y solitaria joven apodada la "Sirena". Entonces, mientras los demás chicos murmuran a su alrededor, Yoshida llama a Tsukumo en secreto. Al encontrarse a solas, Yoshida se acerca a él de manera inesperada. La realidad es que Tsukumo y Yoshida tienen una relación un tanto cercana. Sin embargo, Tsukumo lucha por comprender la distancia romántica entre ellos debido a la inexpresividad de Yoshida, lo que les impide pasar de ser "amigos" a "novios". Así, Tsukumo vive una vida universitaria dulce pero agridulce, intentando navegar entre la amistad y el amor. ¡¡Una serie de Takahashi osamu, autor de Lust Geass!!

title.en: Maou to Ryuuou ni Sodaterareta Shounen wa Gakuen Seikatsu wo Musou suru You desu

altTitles.ja: 魔王と竜王に育てられた少年は学園生活を無双するようです

altTitles.en: The Boy Raised by the Demon Queen and the Dragon Queen Has No Rival

description.en: A boy named Ruisha is trapped in a distorted space created by the ancient hero. What he finds there is the Demon King and the Dragon King, who should have been defeated by the hero 300 years ago. Ruisha befriends the Demon King and the Dragon King, and is trained by them, going from a weak child to a legendary warrior with the power of both demons and dragons. Using his power, Ruisha escaped from the strange place and was accepted into the magic academy where the hero’s descendants live. And now he will have to face many challenges to free the Demon King and Dragon King.
description.ja:
「魔王」と「竜王」の力を継ぐ少年の無双ファンタジー！
才能ゼロの少年ルイシャは、ある日謎の穴に落ちてしまう。その先にいたのは、巨乳で美人の「魔王」と褐色幼女の「竜王」！　2人から300年の修行を受け、少年は魔族と竜族の力に覚醒する！　ちょっとだけHな少年の英雄譚が、タテ読みフルカラーで開幕！

altTitles.ja: 君のラブを見せてくれ！

altTitles.en: Show Me Your Love!
“Show Me Your Love!”

altTitles.zh-ro: Xiàng wǒ zhǎnlù nǐ de ài

altTitles.vi: Hãy cho tôi thấy tình yêu của cậu

description.en: Komichi Shijou, the most famous person at her school, was troubled. Despite being a romantic comedy manga artist, she had no understanding of 'the feeling of love' was stuck in a creative slump. One day, a certain boy and girl appear before her. With their arrival, Komichi Shijou's investigation into 'genuine love' begins…!?
description.ja: 学校イチの有名人・四條恋路は悩んでました。なぜならラブコメ漫画家なのに、彼女には“恋する気持ち”がまったくわからず、スランプになってしまったからです。 そんな彼女の前にひと組の男女が現れます。その男女との出会いにより、彼女・四條恋路による“ホンモノの恋”への探求が始まるのでした…！？『恋愛』を綴る天才漫画家少女はホンモノの“恋”を知らないーー！？
description.pt-br: Komichi Shijou, a pessoa mais famosa da escola, estava preocupada. Apesar de ser uma artista de mangá de comédia romântica, ela não tinha nenhuma compreensão do "sentimento do amor" e estava presa em uma crise criativa. Um dia, um certo garoto e uma garota aparecem diante dela. Com a chegada deles, a investigação de Komichi Shijou sobre o "amor genuíno" começa...!?

altTitles.en: KohaColle

altTitles.ja: コハエースこれくしょん
コハこれ

description.en:
We're ready to activate Super Dogeza toward basically everybody!

A collection of works by the popular manga artist of Koha-Ace, Keikenchi, has finally arrived. Included in this volume are the ultra-rare collaborations with Prisma Illya, Kantai Collection and Lucky☆Star! It's a volume that's sure to get you hooked on the world of Keikenchi! (Koha-Ace side-story collection, released between Koha-Ace EX and Koha-Ace XP)

altTitles.th: พบกันต์ ณ ที่รัก

altTitles.en: My beloved, Pob and Kan

description.en: "Pob, Pob Panus," a renowned solo female artist with an impeccable reputation. However, deep in her heart, Pob has been longing for her first love that faded away many years ago. And that love is "Kan, Kan Thiwa," who once promised to become a singer alongside her. One day, Pob encounters Kan again... as a flower shop owner and a single mother?
